item.title: Molecular Mimicry? Connecting The Basic & Clinical Science of Allergy & Immunology
item.description: Link to UIC talk slides Goals/objectives on medical education 2017 UIC COM MSTP “Molecular Mimicry? Connecting The Basic & Clinical Science of Allergy & Immunology” “This was awesome, I want to look into allergy and immunology now “ “Love humor, interaction. Love how you spoke about the specialty and broke that up throughout talk into small segments to keep us engaged.” “Great Seminar. I could tell you love what you are doing and cared about giving a good talk.
